Sentence_location: Abstract Soil food webs of the McMurdo Dry Valleys, Antarctica are simple.

Sentence_location: To address this, we measured stable isotope natural abundance ratios of C (3c/"C) and N (PN/"4N) for different metazoan taxa (using whole body biomass) to determine soil food web structure in Taylor Valley, Antarctica.

Sentence_location: While other locations in Antarctica have predaceous taxa (Sohlenius and Bostré6m 2005), no studies to date have confirmed a metazoan predator in Taylor Valley.

Sentence_location: Abstract Soil food webs of the McMurdo Dry Valleys, Antarctica are simple.

Sentence_species: The stable isotope composition of soil fauna biomass revealed a wet soil food web with three trophic levels: a basal level of cyanobacterial mat, a secondary level of rotifers, tardigrade A. antarcticus, nematode P. murrayi, and a tertiary level occupied by nematode E. antarcticus (Fig. 2).
Sentence_location: To address this, we measured stable isotope natural abundance ratios of C (3c/"C) and N (PN/"4N) for different metazoan taxa (using whole body biomass) to determine soil food web structure in Taylor Valley, Antarctica.
